gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 129, Lakers 109
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Lakers, 129-109.  Brandon Ingram (26 points, five rebounds, eight assists) and Zion Williamson (26 points, four rebounds, six assists) combined for 52 points in the victory,  Lebron James recorded 34 points, five rebounds and eight assists in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 19-14 on the year while the loss drops the Lakers to 17-17.
